modName: A New Follower- John Van - MacHoard
summary: This Follower is probably the most O.P. follower you will find.
descriptionHtml:
This Follower is probably the most O.P. follower you will find.  He is in full dragonplate armor, ebony mace, daedric shield, sparks, chain lightning, soul trap, and what follower would be complete without being level 81?  John Van - MacHoard can be found in the top room in The Drunken Huntsman.  This is my first mod so tell me what you think.  

He spawns in The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun
author: KryptiicKaoz
